mapper.select: SELECT gathering_payment_rule_id, gathering_id, payment_cycle_code, payment_day, start_date, payment_amount FROM gathering_payment_rule WHERE gathering_id = #{gatheringId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gathering_payment_record (gathering_id, gathering_member_id, gathering_payment_rule_id, payment_amount, payment_due_date, round) values (#{gatheringId}, #{gatheringMemberId}, #{gatheringPaymentRuleId}, #{paymentAmount}, TO_DATE(#{paymentDueDate}, 'YYMMDD'), #{round})
